org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.invocation

Class ToolInvocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.invocation.ToolInvocation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalToolInvocation, SshToolInvocation

    public abstract class ToolInvocation
extends Object
    An abstraction of various forms to bring job using the software that is referenced as a use case towards their execution.
    Author:
    Hajo Nils Krabbenhoeft with some contribution by, Steffen Moeller
